name: Strawberry Chocolate: Miner 8AD 4SS
description: Lost in an uncharted area of the Asteroid Belt, Alicia Crash, Miner number 8ad-4ss, is stuck on an Asteroid flagged as offlimits. But she's not alone. With her, a helpful yet mildly snazzy personal AI helper, and a whole ecosystem of hostile predatory slugs. For many, this would prove a dire situation. However, not for Ms. Crash. Follow her on her journey to milk the gold mine and survive the hostile environment!
